amendment.description: To require a report on actions taken by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to test veterans for vestibular damage.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5127 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5127 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S10902; text: CR S10902) To require a report on actions taken by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to test veterans for vestibular damage.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5127 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Feinstein.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5127 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
